name: @examples/books-navigation
description: Example skill that allows a user to navigate through a list of books

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf build && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.compile: npm run compile-ts && npm run compile-acdl
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clean-release: npm run clean && npm install && npm run release
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'yes' | askx deploy
scripts.clean-deploy: npm run clean && npm install && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-lambda: npm run compile && echo 'yes' | askx deploy -t skill-infrastructure --ignore-hash
